data.title: Malaika Arora Unfollows Ex-Husband, Arbaaz Khan Amid Constant Gossip About Her Breakup With Arjun
data.meta_description: Malaika Arora unfollowed her ex-husband, Arbaaz Khan, from social media months after his second wedding with Sshura Khan.
data.text:
Malaika Arora's personal life has always been a topic of discussion. The actress got married to Arbaaz Khan, and the duo became parents to their son, Arhaan. It was after 19 years of their marital bliss that Arbaaz and Malaika decided to part ways. The duo continued to co-parent their son and maintained a cordial bond. Cut to now, Arbaaz is married to Sshura Khan, and Malaika might have broken up with her beau, Arjun Kapoor. Amid the breakup buzz with Arjun, Malaika recently unfollowed her ex-husband on IG.

advertisement

Malaika Arora unfollows Arbaaz Khan on social media

It was back in December 2024 when Arbaaz Khan got married to Sshura Khan. Soon after that, in January 2024, reports were rife that the actor had unfollowed his ex-wife, Malaika from IG, while she used to follow him till then. Currently, Malaika is celebrating her vacation and enjoying a 'me' time, while Arbaaz is busy celebrating his birthday with his wife, Sshura. Amid this, a report by News18 suggested that Malaika has unfollowed Arbaaz from her IG account. Well, the report seems to be right, as Malaika's following list doesn't consist of Arbaaz Khan's account now.

Recommended Read: Dalljiet Kaur Tags Nikhil Patel As 'Narcissist', Adds 'He Needs Therapy', Deletes The Post Later

advertisement

advertisement

Malaika Arora dropped a cryptic post after Arbaaz Khan got married to Sshura Khan

Malaika Arora has always kept silent over matters related to her personal life. When Arbaaz Khan got married for the second time, one of Malaika's cryptic posts grabbed the attention. It was only five days after Arbaaz's wedding with Sshura when Malaika took to her IG stories and dropped a quote, wherein it was mentioned that she is thankful that she is blessed with basic human needs, like clothes to wear, water to drink, and food to eat. Such a quote grabbed everyone's attention as it came just after Arbaaz Khan's second marriage.

advertisement

Malaika Arora's breakup buzz with Arjun Kapoor

Malaika Arora was in a relationship with Arjun Kapoor for a long time. Well, the duo reportedly parted ways a few months ago for the reason best known to them. As per Pinkvilla, the couple would remain good friends and would not go public with their breakup, as they used to share an adorable bond. Last year, reports were rife that Malaika and Arjun had broken up but reconciled. The reason for this was that one of them wanted to take the plunge, but the other one was not ready for it.

advertisement

Also Read: YouTuber Armaan Malik's Wife, Kritika Is Taking Part In Salman Khan's 'Bigg Boss 18'? Netizens React

advertisement.

Amid their breakup buzz, Malaika Arora and Arjun Kapoor were spotted separately at the Indian Couture Week 2024. The actress was seated in the front row when Arjun walked the ramp, and she was seen stealing glances and looking here and there. Another video featured Arjun protecting Malaika from the crowd. Well, the actress was seen moving forward, and she seemingly avoided any interaction with Arjun.
